description: Java class MessageProcessor responsible for creating and analyzing message wrappers in a messaging framework. It handles initialization from XML configuration, analyses message parameters for variables and enums, and provides an iterator over message wrappers for code generation purposes.

classes.name: MessageProcessor
classes.description: A helper class for processing message definitions, creating wrappers, and analyzing message parameters for use in code generation.

methods.name: buildModel
methods.description: Creates message wrappers from an ICService top-level object, populating the lookup map.

methods.name: analyze
methods.description: Analyzes message parameters to identify used variables, enums, and related constructs.

methods.name: getWrappers
methods.description: Returns an iterator over all message wrappers for further processing.
